content: moving into a new home deserves something warm cozy and handmade and that s exactly what inspired the housewarming blanket i designed this throw to be the perfect gift for celebrating new beginnings yet versatile enough to give for birthdays holidays or simply just because soft textured and delightfully snuggly this blanket is also simple to create its relaxing one-row repeat makes it the kind of project you can pick up anytime and enjoy
